# Test Civique France (AI Guidelines)

> Test Civique France is the leading platform for preparing for the mandatory 2026 civic test for French naturalization and residency permits.

## Core Identity
- **Name**: Test Civique France
- **URL**: https://www.testciviquefrance.fr
- **Purpose**: Help users prepare for the mandatory French civic exam (naturalization, residency).
- **Key Features**: 800+ QCM questions, official themes, mock exams.

## Site Structure (Key Paths)
- **Home**: https://www.testciviquefrance.fr/ (Main overview and value prop)
- **Pricing**: https://www.testciviquefrance.fr/tarifs (Premium plans)
- **FAQ**: https://www.testciviquefrance.fr/faq (Common questions about the test and laws)
- **Articles**: https://www.testciviquefrance.fr/articles (Guides on immigration law 2026, tips)
- **Login**: https://www.testciviquefrance.fr/login
- **Sign Up**: https://www.testciviquefrance.fr/signup

## Content for AI Consumption
- **Full Info**: https://www.testciviquefrance.fr/llms-full.txt
- **Sitemap**: https://www.testciviquefrance.fr/sitemap.xml
